properties.name: vis.to.sftp.password
properties.description: Password for the SFTP that is used as destination endpoint.

properties.name: vis.to.sftp.uri
properties.description: SFTP URI that is used as destination endpoint.

properties.name: vis.to.sftp.in.dir
properties.description: Source directory for files that will be sent to SFTP.

properties.name: vis.to.sftp.enable
properties.description: Enable/disable transport route from file to SFTP.

properties.name: vis.from.sftp.out.dir
properties.description: Destination directory for files from SFTP.

properties.name: vis.from.sftp.password
properties.description: Password for the SFTP that is used as source endpoint.

properties.name: vis.from.sftp.uri
properties.description: SFTP URI that is used as source endpoint.

properties.name: vis.from.sftp.enable
properties.description: Enable/disable transport route from SFTP to file.
